description: Rails 8.1+ ViewComponent UI library with Tailwind CSS v4 and OKLCH theming
rules: Use BetterUi::UiFormBuilder for Rails form integration
Install both the gem (better_ui) and npm package (@pandev-srl/better-ui)
Add @source directive to scan vendor/bundle for Tailwind classes
Use literal Tailwind class strings - never interpolate class names
Use OKLCH color space for theme customization
